means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 庞德 Pond的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"考虑，思考，估量"之意。
means: study ： 普通用词，指对各方面考虑，在制订出计划或采取具体动作之前作认真检查。
consider ： 既指一时的对某事的考虑，也指长时间的深入的思考。
ponder ： 侧重仔细、深入、连续地考虑问题，以作出认真
weigh ： 指作出决策前把问题的各个方面进行比较，权衡利害得失，取有利的方面。
contemplate ： 通常指长时间思考某事，有时含无确定的实际目的。

sentence.Network_en: The visitor can ponder over the boomerangs used by aborigines at the time of Cook.
sentence.Network_cn: 来访者可以琢磨琢磨土著人在库克时期用的回飞镖.

sentence.Network_en: They would do well to pause and ponder upon their new responsibilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们最好还是停一停,好好地想一想自己所负的新责任.

sentence.Network_en: Face west, all you plump old men, and ponder your tropic fates.
sentence.Network_cn: 退休老人们啊, 面向西方, 为你们那莫测的祸福祈祷吧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'appraise, judge the worth of'): from Old French ponderer 'consider', from Latin ponderare 'weigh, reflect on', from pondus, ponder- 'weight'

entry.def: If you ponder something, you think about it carefully.

example.ex: I found myself constantly pondering the question: 'How could anyone do these things?'...
example.tran: 我发现自己总在思考这个问题：“怎么会有人做出这样的事情呢？”

example.ex: The Prime Minister pondered on when to go to the polls...
example.tran: 首相斟酌着何时前往投票地点。

sentences.sentence: "I mulled over the events of the afternoon"
"philosophers have speculated on the question of God for thousands of years"
"The scientist must stop to observe and start to excogitate"

auth_sentence.content: Has anyone ever stopped to ponder why that is.
auth_sentence.res_content: Has anyone ever stopped to ponder why that is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Has anyone ever stopped to ponder why that is.

auth_sentence.content: I did not have time to ponder this question.
auth_sentence.res_content: I did not have time to ponder this question.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I did not have time to ponder this question.

auth_sentence.content: This is an aphorism all of us should ponder.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is an aphorism all of us should ponder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is an aphorism all of us should ponder.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付

stems_affixes.word_buile: ponder重+ous表形容词→adj.笨重的,笨拙的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重量,分量,严重性,重要性,重的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ponder衡量+ance表名词→衡量[重量]→重量

sentences.en: She pondered his marriage proposal for weeks.
sentences.cn: 几个星期以来她认真地考虑着他的求婚。

sentences.en: The young couple are pondering moving their house.
sentences.cn: 这对年轻夫妇正在考虑把自己的家搬走。

sentences.en: We pondered whether to tell him.
sentences.cn: 我们考虑是否要告诉他。

sentences.en: When I asked advice, he pondered and then told me not to go.
sentences.cn: 我向他请示, 他考虑了一下, 然后叫我不要去。

jushi.english: She cast her eyes over the paper, pondered, caught the meaning.
jushi.chinese: 她把眼光盯在那文件上,思考着,领会着其中的含义。

jushi.english: When I asked her advice, she pondered and then told me not to go.
jushi.chinese: 当我征求她的意见时,她沉思了一会儿,然后叫我不要去。

jushi.english: She pondered for some minutes before giving an answer.
jushi.chinese: 她思考了几分钟才作答复。
